posts.post_content: Im looking to purchase or trade for a couple T209-2/ T210 Richmond Colt cards in any condition/grade. Im also interested in other T209/T210 cards as well.Message me if you have any available.Thank you for you time.

Purchasing or trading for these black and white beauties.

Also looking for T210 examples of


Abercrombie Series 5
Novak/Noval Series 7
Simmons Series 7
Still looking to trade and or purchase
